UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the amino acid sequence of the UniProt entry.

Literature.Title: Generation of novel cationic antimicrobial peptides from natural non-antimicrobial sequences by acid-amide substitution.
Literature.Author: Ueno S, Minaba M, Nishiuchi Y, Taichi M, Tamada Y, Yamazaki T, Kato Y

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus IFO 12732(MBC=>300µg/ml),Bacillus subtilis IFO 3134(MBC=>300µg/ml),Micrococcus luteus IFO 12708(MBC=>300µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa IFO 3899(MBC=>300µg/ml),Salmonella typhimurium IFO 13245(MBC=>300µg/ml),Serratia marcescens IFO 3736(MBC=>300µg/ml),Escherichia coli JM109(MBC=>300µg/ml),Saccharomyces cerevisiae MAFF 113011(MBC=>300µg/ml)
